Package library.joints

Class JointToPoint

java.lang.Object
library.joints.Joint
library.joints.JointToPoint
public class JointToPoint
extends Joint
Class for a joint between a body and a point in world space.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class library.joints.Joint

    canGoSlack, dampeningConstant, naturalLength, object1, object1AttachmentPoint, offset1, springConstant

  • Constructor Details

    • JointToPoint

      public JointToPoint​(Vectors2D point, Body b1, double jointLength, double jointConstant, double dampening, boolean canGoSlack, Vectors2D offset1)
      Constructor for a joint between a body and a point.
      Parameters:
      point - The point the joint is attached to
      b1 - First body the joint is attached to
      jointLength - The desired distance of the joint between two points/bodies
      jointConstant - The strength of the joint
      dampening - The dampening constant to use for the joints forces
      canGoSlack - Boolean whether the joint can go slack or not
      offset1 - Offset to be applied to the location of the joint relative to b1's object space

    • JointToPoint

      public JointToPoint​(Body b1, Vectors2D point, double jointLength, double jointConstant, double dampening, boolean canGoSlack, Vectors2D offset1)
      Convenience constructor that works like JointToPoint(Vectors2D, Body, double, double, double, boolean, Vectors2D)
      Parameters:
      point - The point the joint is attached to
      b1 - First body the joint is attached to
      jointLength - The desired distance of the joint between two points/bodies
      jointConstant - The strength of the joint
      dampening - The dampening constant to use for the joints forces
      canGoSlack - Boolean whether the joint can go slack or not
      offset1 - Offset to be applied to the location of the joint relative to b1's object space

      Returns:

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D object to draw to
      paintSettings - Colour settings to draw the objects to screen with
